name: 2025 The 3rd International Conference on Cloud Computing and Computer Network
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer-reviewed by technical program committees based on the paper's topic, quality, etc. Accepted and presented papers will be published in a volume of Springer book series: Signals and Communication Technology. The book series is now indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, SCImago, zbMATH, etc.
organizers: Sensors and System Society of Singapore
